Parameters: int: The volume to set the output to.
onSetVolumeTo(int).Description: Override to handle requests to set the volume of the current output.

Parameters: int: The direction to adjust the volume in.
onAdjustVolume(int).Description: Override to handle requests to adjust the volume of the current output.

Returns: The volume control type for this volume provider
getVolumeControl().Description: Get the volume control type that this volume provider uses.

getCurrentVolume().Description: Get the current volume of the provider.

getMaxVolume().Description: Get the maximum volume this provider allows.

Parameters: int: The current volume of the output.
setCurrentVolume(int).Description: Set the current volume and notify the system that the volume has been changed.

Returns: An equivalent @B_android#media#VolumeProvider_E@ object, or null if none.
getVolumeProvider().Description: Gets the underlying framework @B_android#media#VolumeProvider_E@ object. This method is only supported on API 21+.

Parameters: int: The method for controlling volume that is used by this provider.
VolumeProviderCompat(int, int, int).Description: Create a new volume provider for handling volume events. You must specify the type of volume control and the maximum volume that can be used.
VolumeProviderCompat(int, int, int).FullName: VolumeProviderCompat (int volumeControl, int maxVolume, int currentVolume)

ClassDesc: Handles requests to adjust or set the volume on a session. This is also used to push volume updates back to the session after a request has been handled. You can set a volume provider on a session by calling @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat#setPlaybackToRemote_E@.
